test_customers module

test_customers.client()[source]

Pytest fixture to provide a Flask test client for API testing.

Yield:

A Flask test client

test_customers.test_api_add_customer(client)[source]

Test the ‘api_add_customer’ API endpoint.

Parameters:

client – The Flask test client

test_customers.test_api_charge_customer(client)[source]

Test the ‘api_charge_customer’ API endpoint.

Parameters:

client – The Flask test client

test_customers.test_api_charge_customer_not_found(client)[source]

Test the ‘api_charge_customer’ API endpoint with a non-existent user.

Parameters:

client – The Flask test client

Test the ‘api_deduct_customer’ API endpoint.

Parameters:

Parameters:

client – The Flask test client
